product_name: Kelty Mistral 40 Sleeping Bag - Men's Extra Long - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Spacious in size and rich in value, the Mistral 40 bag offers summer and fall backpackers comfort-oriented features such as a pillow pocket and a conveniently positioned zippered chest pocket.
short_description: Spacious in size and rich in value, the Mistral 40 bag offers summer and fall backpackers comfort-oriented features such as a pillow pocket and a conveniently positioned zippered chest pocket.
